meanings.sent1: Every day, she journalizes the sales in the company ledger.
meanings.sent2: The accountant journalizes all the expenses for tax purposes.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to journalizes its adventures by paw-printing on a notebook.
meanings.sent4: Her memory journalizes every moment like a meticulous librarian.
meanings.sent5: The pen danced on the paper as it journalizes the story of a lifetime.

meanings.definition: To make a record of financial transactions in a journal.
meanings.sent1: He carefully journalizes each transaction to keep the accounts accurate.
meanings.sent2: The small business owner journalizes every sale to track profits.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel decided to journalizes its nut savings for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Time journalizes our financial decisions, revealing our priorities.
meanings.sent5: The ink flows smoothly as it journalizes the financial health of the business.
